survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee awareness and preferences regarding sustainable office supplies to guide corporate sustainability initiatives.

questions.question_text: How often do you use sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, biodegradable pens) in your daily work?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clear frequency measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly dropdown for answer options.

script.question_text: How often do you use sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, biodegradable pens) in your daily work?

questions.question_text: Which sustainable office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question. Randomize options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which sustainable office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of sustainable office supplies?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option if space allows.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with optional 'Other' text field)

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of sustainable office supplies?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of sustainable office supplies in your workplace?

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of sustainable office supplies in your workplace?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using more sustainable office supplies?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture overlapping barriers.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using more sustainable office supplies?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a slight premium (5-10%) for sustainable office supplies if they were not provided by the company?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale to avoid neutral bias.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a slight premium (5-10%) for sustainable office supplies if they were not provided by the company?

questions.question_text: How important is it for your company to prioritize sustainable office supplies?
questions.client_notes: Label all points on the scale for clarity.

script.question_text: How important is it for your company to prioritize sustainable office supplies?

questions.question_text: Which of the following would encourage you to use more sustainable office supplies? (Select up to 3)
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with max 3 selections)

script.question_text: Which of the following would encourage you to use more sustainable office supplies? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: Do you believe using sustainable office supplies contributes meaningfully to environmental goals?
questions.client_notes: Include a brief definition of 'meaningfully' in the question if needed.

script.question_text: Do you believe using sustainable office supplies contributes meaningfully to environmental goals?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional suggestions for improving sustainable office supply adoption in your workplace.
questions.client_notes: Optional open-ended question for qualitative insights.

script.question_text: Please share any additional suggestions for improving sustainable office supply adoption in your workplace.
